text: Peter Wright, was bass guitar player and vocalist for anarchist punk band Crass, from 1977 until 1984. Occasionally he is credited as Pete Wrong on the band's record covers. After the dissolution of Crass he formed the performance art duo, Judas II. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Crass members Category:Anarcho-punk musicians Category:British anarchists Category:English anarchists Category:English punk rock singers Category:English punk rock bass guitarists Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Pete Wright (musician)
